content:
You're welcome! It's great that you're aware of the differences between Spanish and French and are willing to adapt to the unique characteristics of each language. Remember to be patient with yourself, stay consistent, and practice regularly. With time and effort, you'll become proficient in French and be able to hold conversations with native speakers.

Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further guidance. Good luck with your language learning journey, and I hope you continue to enjoy your conversations with your abuela in Spanish!
